column1: in memory of grace j. ""nonni"" nelson -- lombardo funeral home| first: last: death: june 13
column2: 2015. this memorial provided by:lombardo funeral home. orchard park
column4: 2015 send card (nee ranne) ""nonni"" of orchard park
column7: devoted mother of terri (tom trevean) nelson; cherished grandmother of mc. kenzie trevean and madison trevean; great-grandmother of millie and trevan; loving daughter of the late john and carmela ranne; dear sister of john (linda) ranne and the late theresa ranne and joanna (michael) ranne mead; also survived by relatives and friends. relatives and friends may visit the lombardo funeral home (southtowns chapel)
column8: 3060 abbott rd. near lake ave. on thursday from 4-8 pm. a mass of christian burial will be celebrated in our lady of the sacred heart church
column10: orchard park on friday morning at 10 o'clock. (please assemble at church).
